Patches.name: ActionSound Library
Patches.description: Action sound library like crowd noise, block noises, collision noise,...
Patches.note: To edit the sound, go to SOUND/TAKATTO_ACTION_SOUND folder. To uninstall, just delete the folder.

Patches.name: Jukebox Collection
Patches.description: A collection of 50+ songs for Jukebox, personally selected by me~ :3
Patches.note: This will overwrite your current Jukebox music list.

Patches.name: [UI] S.Camp helper
Patches.description: Help you to do minigames effortlessly, 3 minutes saved every day.

Patches.name: [UI] Cleanner court
Patches.description: Remove the ugly crew logo on court.

Patches.name: [UI] Open dice shop
Patches.description: Allow you to manual open the Billy's dice shop instead of having to roll for it!
Patches.note: To open the Billy's shop anytime, open the Billy's Dice event and press 9 on keyboard.

Patches.name: [UI] Street block helper
Patches.description: Allow you to quick buy 300 by just clicking the buy button and draw up 100 street block puzzles at a time!
Patches.note:
I know right!
[1.1] Unable to drag fixed!

Patches.name: [UI] Auto login
Patches.description: Automatically log you in as soon as the game finishes loading~

Patches.name: [UI] Brighter game
Patches.description: Brighten the game by removing the weird shadow overlay.

Patches.name: [UI] Resolution unlocker
Patches.description: Allow you to change resolution from Option menu while having graphic setting set to low.

Patches.name: [STD] Nudity project
Patches.description: Makes everyone nude. Not good for human eyes. Hair will be shipped in the next version. Greatly improve FPS and loading speed.
Patches.note: I have warned you~ To revert back just uninstall.

Patches.name: [STD] Custom court 01
Patches.description: This is basically a blue training court but editable! Occupy the slot 01 on Custom Court.
Patches.note: Read the readme.txt from Data/takatto_tweak_dlc1/custom/data/stage100_training/tutorial for tutorial.
